settings.code:
<style>
    #video{
        width: 100%;
    }
    .panel {
        display: none;
    }
    .panel.active {
        display: block;
    }
    .pin-spacer {
        background-color: #000;
    }
    .mol_text{
        display: none;
    }
    .t4s-video-popup-inline .t4s-btn-icon use {
        display: none;
    }

    .t4s-video-popup-inline .t4s-btn-icon {
        background: url('https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0257/5246/9566/files/play_normal.svg?v=1693532989') center center/100% 100% no-repeat;
        color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);
        width: 20px;
        height: 20px;
    }
    .t4s-video-popup-inline .t4s-btn-effect-fade:hover .t4s-btn-icon{
        background: url('https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0257/5246/9566/files/play.svg?v=1691737328') center center/100% 100% no-repeat;
    }
    .t4s-video-popup-inline .t4s-content-position p:nth-child(2){
        background: linear-gradient(99deg, #17EDB1 40.03%, #078AE8 96.48%);
        background-clip: text;
        -webkit-background-clip: text;
        -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
    }
    .section_box {
        max-width: 1200px;
        margin: 0 auto;
        padding-top: 200px;
    }

    section {
        background-color: #000000;
    }

    section p {
        margin: 0;
    }

    /* Top Buy */
    .top_buy {
        position: absolute;
        top: 100px;
        left: 0;
        width: 100%;
        z-index: 999;
        background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);
    }

    .top_buy .top_content {
        max-width: 1280px;
        margin: 0 auto;
        border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: space-between;
        padding: 13px 0;
    }

    .top_buy .top_content p {
        font-size: 20px;
        font-weight: 600;
        line-height: 20px;
        color: #FFFFFF;
        margin: 0;
    }

    .top_buy .top_content .rigth {
        position: relative;
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
    }

    .top_buy .top_content .rigth span {
        font-size: 14px;
        color: #FFFFFF;
        margin-right: 40px;
        position: relative;
        z-index: 1;
    }

    .top_buy .top_content .rigth span:hover {
        cursor: pointer;
        color: #D2D2D7;
    }

    .top_buy .top_content .rigth span.active {
        color: #D2D2D7;
    }

    .top_buy .top_content .rigth .buy_button>a {
        display: inline-block;
        text-align: center;
        font-weight: 600;
        font-size: 14px;
        color: #000000;
        padding: 5px 20px;
        background: #03F2A6;
        text-decoration: none;
        border-radius: 40px;
        position: relative;
        z-index: 1;
    }

    .top_buy .top_content .rigth .buy_button>a:hover {
        background: #00cc88;
    }

    .top_buy .top_content .rigth .buy_button:hover .shop_popup {
        opacity: 1;
        pointer-events: auto;
    }

    .top_buy .top_content .rigth .shop_popup {
        position: absolute;
        right: 0;
        top: 30px;
        padding-top: 30px;
        pointer-events: none;
        opacity: 0;
    }

    .top_buy .top_content .rigth .popup_box {
        width: 165px;
        background: #fff;
        border-radius: 12px;
        padding: 0 10px;
    }

    .top_buy .top_content .rigth .popup_box a {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: flex-start;
        width: 100%;
        text-align: center;
        font-weight: 600;
        font-size: 12px;
        line-height: 14px;
        color: #747476;
        padding: 5px 0;
        text-decoration: none;
    }

    .top_buy .top_content .rigth .popup_box a img {
        max-width: 26px;
        margin-right: 10px;
    }

    .top_buy .top_content .rigth .popup_box a:nth-child(1) {
        border-bottom: 1px solid #D2D2D7;
    }

    .top_buy .top_content .rigth .popup_box a:hover {
        color: #000000;
    }

    .top_50 {
        position: fixed;
        top: 0 !important;
        background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
        border-bottom: 1 solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
        animation: top-animeit .5s linear;
    }

    @keyframes top-animeit {
        0% {
            transform: translateY(-100%);
        }

        100% {
            transform: translateY(0);
        }
    }

    .top_50 .top_content {
        border: none;
    }
    .section_1 .section_box{
        padding-top: 120px;
    }
    .section_1 .img_list {
        position: relative;
        height: 656px;
    }

    .section_1 .mobile_img_list {
        display: none;
    }

    .section_1 .img_list .list {
        position: absolute;
        border-radius: 8px;
        overflow: hidden;
        opacity: 0;
    }

    .section_1 .img_list .list_1 {
        top: 0;
        left: 0;
        width: 276px;
        height: 190px;
    }

    .section_1 .img_list .list_2 {
        top: 0;
        left: 292px;
        width: 532px;
        height: 420px;
        transform: scale(2.5);
    }

    .section_1 .img_list .list_3 {
        top: 0;
        right: 0;
        width: 360px;
        height: 220px;
    }

    .section_1 .img_list .list_4 {
        top: 236px;
        right: 0;
        width: 360px;
        height: 184px;
    }

    .section_1 .img_list .list_5 {
        bottom: 0;
        right: 0;
        width: 420px;
        height: 220px;
    }

    .section_1 .img_list .list_6 {
        bottom: 0;
        right: 436px;
        width: 228px;
        height: 220px;
    }

    .section_1 .img_list .list_7 {
        bottom: 0;
        left: 292px;
        width: 228px;
        height: 220px;
    }
    .section_1 .img_list .list_8 {
        bottom: 0;
        left: 0;
        width: 276px;
        height: 450px;
    }
    .section_2 .section_box h2 {
        font-size: 68px;
        line-height: 78px;
        font-weight: 600;
        color: #FFFFFF;
    }

    .section_2 .section_box p {
        color: #999;
        font-size: 20px;
        line-height: 20px;
        margin: 16px 0 80px 0;
    }
    .section_2 .img_list{
        display: flex;
        gap: 44px;
    }
    .section_2 .img_list img{
        border-radius: 12px;
    }
    .section_3 .top_box,.section_3 .bottom_box{
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: space-between;
    }
    .section_3 .top_box .left{
        max-width: 420px;
    }
    .section_3 .top_box .left h3{
        color: #FFF;
        font-size: 40px;
        font-weight: 600;
        line-height: 50px;
    }
    .section_3 .top_box .left p:nth-child(2){
        color: #999;
        font-size: 16px;
        line-height: 24px;
        margin: 16px 0 60px 0;
    }
    .section_3 .top_box .left p:nth-child(3){
        font-size: 68px;
        font-weight: 600;
        line-height: 68px;
        background: linear-gradient(98deg, #17EDB1 39.87%, #078AE8 96.77%);
        background-clip: text;
        -webkit-background-clip: text;
        -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
        margin: 0 0 12px 0;
    }
    .section_3 .top_box .left p:nth-child(4){
        color: #FFF;
        font-size: 20px;
        line-height: 20px;
        margin: 0;
    }
    .section_3 .top_box .right{
      max-width: 640px;
      border-radius: 12px;
      overflow: hidden;  
    }
    
    .section_3 .bottom_box{
        padding: 120px 35px 0 0;
    }
    .section_3 .bottom_box .left{
        max-width: 640px;
        border-radius: 12px;
        overflow: hidden;  
    }
    .section_3 .bottom_box .right{
        max-width: 450px;
    }
    .section_3 .bottom_box .right h3{
        color: #FFF;
        font-size: 40px;
        font-weight: 600;
        line-height: 50px;
        margin-bottom: 80px;
    }
    .section_3 .bottom_box .right .icon_item{
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 20px;
    }
    .section_3 .bottom_box .right div:nth-child(3){
        margin: 28px 0;
    }
    .section_3 .bottom_box .right .item_text p:nth-child(1){
        color: #FFF;
        font-size: 24px;
        font-weight: 600;
        line-height: 24px;
        margin: 0;
    }
    .section_3 .bottom_box .right .item_text p:nth-child(1) span{
        font-size: 40px;
        line-height: 40px;
        background: linear-gradient(98deg, #17EDB1 39.87%, #078AE8 96.77%);
        padding: 0 5px;
        background-clip: text;
        -webkit-background-clip: text;
        -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
    }
    .section_3 .bottom_box .right .item_text p:nth-child(2){
        color: #999;
        font-size: 20px;
        line-height: 20px;
        margin: 12px 0 0 0;
    }
    .section_4 .section_box{
        padding: 200px 0;
    }
    .section_4 .section_box h2{
        color: #FFF;
        font-size: 68px;
        font-weight: 600;
        line-height: 78px; 
    }
    .section_4 .section_box>p{
        color: #999;
        font-size: 20px;
        line-height: 28px;
        margin: 16px 0 40px 0;
    }
    .section_4 .premium_bgc{
        position: relative;
    }
    .section_4 .premium_bgc .icon_item{
        position: absolute;
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 20px;
    }
    .section_4 .premium_bgc .icon_item p{
        color: #FFF;
        font-size: 24px;
        font-weight: 600;
        line-height: 24px;
        margin: 0;
    }
    .section_4 .premium_bgc img{
        max-width: 130%;
    }
    .section_5{
        position: relative;
    }
    .section_5 .text_box{
        position: absolute;
        max-width: 900px;
        top: 17%;
        right: 22%;
    }
    .section_5 .text_box h2{
        color: #FFF;
        font-size: 56px;
        font-weight: 600;
        line-height: 56px;
    }
    .section_5 .text_box p{
        color: #999;
        font-size: 16px;
        line-height: 24px;
        max-width: 780px;
        margin: 28px 0 75px 0;
    }
    .section_5 .text_box img{
        width: 360px;
        border-radius: 8px;
    }
    
    .section_6 .section_box,.section_7 .section_box{
        text-align: center;
    }
    .section_6 h2,.section_7 h2{
        color: #FFF;
        font-size: 56px;
        font-weight: 600;
        line-height: 56px;
    }
    .section_6 p,.section_7 p{
        color: #999;
        font-size: 16px;
        line-height: 24px;
        max-width: 820px;
        margin: 16px auto 40px auto;
    }
    .section_6 img,.section_7 video{
        border-radius: 12px;
    }
    .section_8{
        text-align: center;
    }
    .section_8 .section_box h2{
        color: #FFF;
        font-size: 56px;
        font-weight: 600;
        line-height: 56px; 
    }
    .section_8 .section_box .Levels{
        max-width: 478px;
        margin: 40px 0 -260px 0;
    }
    .section_8 .icon_and_bgm{
        position: relative;
    }
    .section_8 .icon_and_bgm .icon_item{
        position: absolute;
        bottom: 75px;
        left: 70px;
        right: 70px;
        display: flex;
        gap: 48px;
        align-items: center;
    }
    .section_9,.section_4{
        overflow: hidden;
    }
    .section_9 .section_box{
        padding: 200px 0;
    }
    .section_9 h2{
        color: #FFF;
        font-size: 68px;
        font-weight: 600;
        line-height: 78px;
    }
    
    .section_9 .section_box > p{
        color: #999;
        font-size: 20px;
        line-height: 20px;
        margin: 16px 0 40px 0;
    }
    .section_9 .ports_slider{
        position: relative;
    }
    .section_9 .swiper-wrapper{
        align-items: center;
    }
    .section_9 .item{
        opacity: .5;
    }
    .section_9 .item.swiper-slide-active{
        opacity: 1;
    }
    .section_9 .item img{
        border-radius: 12px;
    }
    .section_9 .item p{
        color: #FFF;
        font-size: 32px;
        font-weight: 500;
        line-height: 32px;
        text-align: center;
        margin: 28px 0 0 0;
    }
    .ports_slider .swiper-button-prev,.ports_slider .swiper-rtl .swiper-button-next{
        left: -75px!important;
    }
    .ports_slider .swiper-button-next,.ports_slider .swiper-rtl .swiper-button-prev{
        right: -75px!important;
    }
    .ports_slider .swiper-button-next,.ports_slider .swiper-button-prev{
        width: 40px;
        height: 40px;
        background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);
    }
    .ports_slider .swiper-button-next:after,.ports_slider .swiper-button-prev:after{
        font-size: 20px;
        color: rgba(153, 153, 153, 1);
    }
    .ports_slider .swiper-button-next:after:hover{
        color: #fff;
    }
    .ports_slider .swiper-button-prev:after:hover{
        color: #fff;
    }
    .section_10 {
        position: relative;
    }

    .section_10 .section_box {
        position: absolute;
        top: 50%;
        left: 50%;
        transform: translateX(-50%) translateY(-50%);
        text-align: center;
        z-index: 1;
        height: 330px;
        width: 950px;
        padding: 0;
    }

    .section_10 .section_box>p {
        font-size: 36px;
        font-weight: 600;
        color: #FFFFFF;
        line-height: 60px;
    }

    .section_10 .section_box>div {
        position: absolute;
        top: 80px;
    }

    .section_10 .section_box .ug_logo {
        opacity: 0;
        margin-top: 20px;
    }

    .section_10 .section_box .text_box p {
        color: #FFF;
        font-size: 20px;
        line-height: 30px;
    }

    .section_10 .section_box .text_box p:nth-child(1) {
        margin-bottom: 20px;
    }

    .section_10 .mask_layer {
        position: absolute;
        top: 0;
        left: 0;
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
        background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
        opacity: 0;
    }

    .section_10 .mask_layer .mask_layer_bottom {
        position: absolute;
        bottom: 0;
        left: 0;
        width: 100%;
        height: 240px;
        background: linear-gradient(180deg, rgba(16, 16, 16, 0) 0%, #000000 100%);
        opacity: 0;
    }
    .mob_text{
        display: none;
        padding: 20px 18px 0 18px;
    }
    .mob_text p{
        color: #FFF;
        font-size: 14px;
        font-weight: 400;
        line-height: 24px;
        margin-bottom: 12px;
    }

    .section_11 .section_box h2 {
        font-size: 56px;
        font-weight: 600;
        color: #FFFFFF;
        line-height: 56px;
        margin-bottom: 40px;
        text-align: center;
    }

    .section_11 .section_box .charging_slider {
        padding: 40px 90px 80px 90px;
        background: #181818;
        border-radius: 12px;
        overflow: hidden;
    }

    .section_11 .section_box .tabs_slider {
        max-width: 800px;
        margin: 0 auto 80px auto;
        overflow: hidden;
    }

    .section_11 .section_box .tabs_slider .item {
        text-align: center;
        border-radius: 60px;
        padding: 12px 0;
        font-weight: 600;
        font-size: 16px;
        background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
        color: #FFFFFF;
        cursor: pointer;
    }

    .section_11 .section_box .tabs_slider .item.swiper-slide-thumb-active,
    .section_11 .section_box .tabs_slider .item:hover {
        background: #FFFFFF;
        color: #000;
    }

    .section_11 .section_box .img_slider {
        overflow: hidden;
        height: auto;
    }

    .section_11 .section_box .img_slider .item {
        height: 0;
    }

    .section_11 .section_box .img_slider .item.swiper-slide-active {
        height: auto;
    }
    .section_12{
        padding-bottom: 120px;
    }
    .section_12 h2{
        color: #FFF;
        text-align: center;
        font-size: 56px;
        font-weight: 600;
        line-height: normal;
        margin-bottom: 40px;
    }
    .section_12 .product_list{
        display: flex;
        justify-content: space-between;
        gap: 40px;
    }
    .section_12 .product_list .item{
        border-radius: 12px;
        background: #181818;
        padding: 18px 40px 40px 40px;
        text-align: center;
    }
    .section_12 .product_list .item img{
        max-width: 260px;
    }
    .section_12 .product_list .item p{
        color: #FFF;
        text-align: center;
        font-size: 20px;
        font-weight: 600;
        line-height: 30px;
        margin: 12px 0 40px 0;
    }
    .section_12 .product_list .item a{
        display: inline-block;
        border-radius: 60px;
        border: 1.5px solid #FFF;
        padding: 12px 46px;
        color: #FFF;
        font-size: 16px;
        font-weight: 600;
        transition: .4s;
    }
    .section_12 .product_list .item a:hover{
        color: #000;
        background-color: #fff;
    }
    /* specs */
    .specs {
        background: #000000;
        padding: 180px 0 120px 0;
        position: absolute;
        top: 100px;
        left: 0;
        width: 100%;
        z-index: 998;
    }

    .specs_box {
        max-width: 1280px;
        margin: 0 auto;
        padding: 0 15px;
    }

    .specs_box h2 {
        color: #FFF;
        text-align: center;
        font-size: 40px;
        font-weight: 600;
        line-height: 56px;
        margin-bottom: 60px;
    }

    .specs_box ul {
        margin: 0;
        padding: 0;
    }
    .specs_box .item ul li {
        width: 25%;
        text-align: center;
        padding: 28px 0;
    }
    .specs_box ul li:nth-child(1) li{
        padding: 0 42px;
    }
    .specs_box ul li:nth-child(1) li p{
        color: #FFF;
        font-size: 20px;
        font-weight: 600;
        line-height: 20px;
        margin: 0;
        padding-bottom: 28px;
        border-bottom: 1px solid #999;
    }
    .specs_box ul .product_img{
        padding: 40px 0;
    }
    .specs_box ul .product_img li{
        padding: 0 28px;
    }
    .specs_box .item ul {
        display: flex;
        align-items: flex-start;
        justify-content: flex-start;
        gap: 20px;
    }

    

    .specs_box .item a {
        display: inline-block;
        padding: 11px 29px;
        background: #FFFFFF;
        border-radius: 60px;
        font-weight: 600;
        font-size: 14px;
        line-height: normal;
        color: #000000;
        transition: .4s;
        margin-top: 40px;
    }

    .specs_box .item a:hover {
        background: #03F2A6;
    }
    .specs_box .item span{
        color: #FFF;
        font-size: 20px;
        font-weight: 600;
        line-height: 20px; 
    }
    .specs_box .item p{
        color: #757575;
        font-size: 14px;
        line-height: 18px;
        margin: 12px auto 0 auto;
        min-width: 200px;
        max-width: 260px;
        word-wrap:break-word;
    }
    @media(max-width:1440px) {
        .section_5 .text_box{
            right: 5%;
        }
    }
    @media(max-width:767px) {
        .section_box {
            padding: 80px 18px 0 18px;
            overflow: hidden;
        }
        .pc_text{
            display: none;
        }
        .mol_text{
            display: block;
        }
        /* Top Buy */
        .top_buy {
            background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
        }

        .top_buy .top_content {
            max-width: 100%;
            padding: 16px 0;
            margin: 0 18px;
        }

        .top_buy .top_content p {
            font-size: 18px;
            line-height: 18px;
        }

        .top_buy .top_content .rigth span {
            font-size: 12px;
            margin-right: 12px;
        }

        .top_buy .top_content .rigth .buy_button>a {
            font-size: 12px;
            line-height: 12px;
            padding: 6px 15px;
        }

        .top_buy .top_content .rigth .shop_popup {
            top: 20px;
        }

        .section_1 .img_list {
            display: none;
        }
        .section_1 .mobile_img_list{
            display: block;
        }
        .section_1 .section_box{
            padding-top: 60px;
        }
        .section_2 .section_box{
            padding: 80px 0 0 0;
        }
        .section_2 .section_box h2 {
            font-size: 28px;
            line-height: 36px;
            padding: 0 18px;
        } 
        
        .section_2 .section_box p{
            font-size: 14px;
            line-height: 22px;
            margin: 12px 0 28px 0;
            padding: 0 18px;
        }
        .section_2 .img_list{
            flex-direction: column;
            gap: 12px;
            padding: 29px 18px 0 18px;
        }
        .section_3 .top_box, .section_3 .bottom_box{
            flex-direction: column;
            gap: 28px;
        }
        .section_3 .top_box .left,.section_3 .bottom_box .left,.section_3 .top_box .right,.section_3 .bottom_box .right{
            max-width: 100%;
        }
        .section_3 .top_box .left h3{
            font-size: 28px;
            line-height: 36px;
        }
        .section_3 .top_box .left p:nth-child(2){
            font-size: 14px;
            line-height: 22px;
            margin: 12px 0 28px 0;
        }
        .section_3 .top_box .left p:nth-child(3){
            font-size: 28px;
            line-height: 32px;
            margin: 0 0 4px 0;
            display: inline-block;
        }
        .section_3 .top_box .left p:nth-child(4){
            font-size: 14px;
            font-weight: 500;
            line-height: 20px;
        }
        .section_3 .top_box .right{
            border-radius: 8px;
        }
        .section_3 .bottom_box{
            padding: 80px 0 0 0;
        }
